abstract: Sam Roberts reviews War Against All Pureto Ricans: Revolution and Terror in America's Colony by Nelson A Denis, Brooklyn Heights: The Rise, Fall and Rebirth of America's First Suburb by Robert Furman and Gangland New York: The Places and Faces of Mob History by Anthony DeStefano.
lead_paragraph: Sam Roberts describes a new book about the Puerto Rican independence movement and one about Brooklyn Heights.

headline.main: New York Bookshelf: The Last Big Colony and the First Suburb
headline.print_headline: The Last Big Colony and the First Suburb

snippet: Sam Roberts describes a new book about the Puerto Rican independence movement and one about Brooklyn Heights.
